reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: The Art of Music Foundation - promoting the performance and appreciation of art of music and to use its trasformative power to change lives

description.narrative: The project aim at promoting the performance and appreciation of art of music and to use its transformative power to change lives of those living in underprivileged areas. The project will inculcate life skills that will give the beneficiaries options for the direction their lives will take. The project will nurture positive values in children with an aim to develop low-income young people into prosperous individuals who rise above poverty and set examples for their communities. The project will have long-t erm social positive change by providing links to scholarships to local secondary schools for outstanding students involved in the project enabling them to create a better life for themselves and their communities. The project will include an integrated sch edule of intensive residential courses during school holidays as well as workshops and master classes throughout the project period.
